title: For any Housing Scheme or residential development project wherein, owing to the relevant provisions of the Development Control Regulations / Laws, 20% or more of the basic FSI is required to be utilized towards construction of residential tenements for the EWS / LIG
clause_text: For any Housing Scheme or residential development project wherein, owing to the relevant provisions of the Development Control Regulations / Laws, 20% or more of the basic FSI is required to be utilized towards construction of residential tenements for the EWS / LIG.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
